credit_line: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
title: Land for the Working People
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection. Mrs. Shapiro acquired this plate from a former girlfriend of Natan Altman.
description: Circular, green ground with red lettering and image; in the center a lozenge with sickle, wheat sheaf, stylized factory; around the border the slogan in Russian, "Land for the Working People."
name: Plate
